channel.title: RuneNova - Bounty Hunter, Pest Control, God Wars, Barrows, Staking, & Much more!
channel.description:
[center][url=http://RuneNova.com][img]http://runenova.com/style/images/logo.jpg[/img][/url]
[B]Client version:[/B] 530 [B]Framework:[/B] RSE (Created by Peril) [b]Network:[/b] Netty ([url=http://www.jboss.org/netty]http://www.jboss.org/netty[/url])
[img]http://runenova.com/images/play.png[/img][b][url=http://runenova.com/index.php?pageid=play]Play Now[/url][/b] [img]http://runenova.com/images/hiscores.gif[/img][b][url=http://runenova.com/hiscores]Hiscores[/url][/b] [img]http://runenova.com/images/forum.png[/img][b][url=http://runenova.com/]Community[/url][/b] [img]http://s.ytimg.com/yt/favicon-refresh-vfldLzJxy.ico[/img][b][url=http://youtube.com/RuneNovaTv]RuneNovaTv[/url][/b] [img]http://runenova.com/images/gallery.png[/img][b][url=http://img259.imageshack.us/slideshow/webplayer.php?id=wcing.png]Image Gallery[/url][/b]
[I]It seems there is a high demand for lower revision servers. With this said, I feel 530 is a great revision to base off of. It has some of RuneScape's most unique and fun past/present content such as Bounty Hunter, Wilderness PvP, Clan Wars, etc.[/I] [/center] [b]Quests[/b]
-Learning the Ropes -Animal Magnetism -Death Plateau -Recipe for Disaster -Desert Treasure
[b]Bosses[/b] -God Wars -King Black Dragon -Tormented Demons
[b]Minigames[/b] -Dueling -Fight Caves -Bounty Hunter -Pest Control -Barrows -Warriors Guild
[b]Low Training Areas[/b] -Rock Crabs -Hill Giants -Experiments
[b]Med Training Areas[/b] -Ice Warriors -Bandit Camp -Ogres
[b]High Training Areas[/b] -Taverly Dungeon -Metal Dragons -Monkey Guards -TzHaar
[b]Trainable Stats[/b] -Attack -Strength -Defence -Ranged -Prayer -Magic -Hitpoints -Runecrafting -Agility -Herblore -Thieving -Crafting -Fletching -Slayer -Mining -Smithing -Fishing -Cooking -Firemaking -Woodcutting -Farming
[b]Misc features[/b] -Supply shops for specific stats. -Full Character Design -Vote4Items -Fast leveling -Clan Chat -Friends/Ignores -Prayer -Items Kept On Death w/ interface -More

item.title: RuneNova - Bounty Hunter, Pest Control, God Wars, Barrows, Staking, & Much more!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:6, topic:446149”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=549007.msg4024936#msg4024936 date=1340263990]
Might want to include some media for others to see a look at this, and I wouldn’t recommend making members register to play.
[/quote]There’s an image gallery in the OP. Maybe read it?[/quote]
Oops. Calm down.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

It really isnt often I say this, but, this looks absolutely brilliant. I really, really like the look of it. If you guys run into any website issues or anything, feel free to pm me.

item.title: RuneNova - Bounty Hunter, Pest Control, God Wars, Barrows, Staking, & Much more!
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“jc09, post:1, topic:446149”][center]

Client version: 530
Framework: RSE (Created by Peril)
Network: Netty (http://www.jboss.org/netty)

Play Now
Hiscores
Community
RuneNovaTv
Image Gallery

It seems there is a high demand for lower revision servers.
With this said, I feel 530 is a great revision to base off of. It has
some of RuneScape’s most unique and fun past/present content
such as Bounty Hunter, Wilderness PvP, Clan Wars, etc.
[/center]
Quests

-Learning the Ropes
-Animal Magnetism
-Death Plateau
-Recipe for Disaster
-Desert Treasure

Bosses
-God Wars
-King Black Dragon
-Tormented Demons

Minigames
-Dueling
-Fight Caves
-Bounty Hunter
-Pest Control
-Barrows
-Warriors Guild

Low Training Areas
-Rock Crabs
-Hill Giants
-Experiments

Med Training Areas
-Ice Warriors
-Bandit Camp
-Ogres

High Training Areas
-Taverly Dungeon
-Metal Dragons
-Monkey Guards
-TzHaar

Trainable Stats
-Attack
-Strength
-Defence
-Ranged
-Prayer
-Magic
-Hitpoints
-Runecrafting
-Agility
-Herblore
-Thieving
-Crafting
-Fletching
-Slayer
-Mining
-Smithing
-Fishing
-Cooking
-Firemaking
-Woodcutting
-Farming

Misc features
-Supply shops for specific stats.
-Full Character Design
-Vote4Items
-Fast leveling
-Clan Chat
-Friends/Ignores
-Prayer
-Items Kept On Death w/ interface
-More[/quote]
teach mr.heatrn11 how to make that Logo, epic…

Read full topic
